name: Draw an Umbrella
description:
Draw an umbrella ✧・ﾟ:* challenge your inner artist in this mini drawing game

Features include:

 - Ez Easy Mode: use your mouse or trackpad to trace the stencil~

 - Hard Boss Mode: control a pencil using your keyboard (it's harder than it sounds)

 - Saving Feature: check the _Data folder (Windows) or the Contents folder (Mac) to see your finished drawing ♡
